trans-unit.source: Performs administrative tasks required on a SQL Server database to support the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency" /> class when using polling-based dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 在 SQL Server 資料庫上執行所需的管理工作，以在使用輪詢式相依性時支援 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency" /> 類別。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: You can use the methods of this class to programmatically enable and disable a SQL Server database and its tables for <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency> object change notifications.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個類別的方法，以程式設計方式啟用和停用 SQL Server 資料庫資料表和其資料表<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency>物件變更通知。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this class obtains information about which tables in a database are enabled for change notifications using the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.GetTablesEnabledForNotifications%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此外，此類別可取得的資訊的資料庫中的資料表已啟用變更通知使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.GetTablesEnabledForNotifications%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: However, you can also use the Aspnet_regsql command-line tool to manage change notifications for a SQL Server database and its tables.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您也可以使用 Aspnet_regsql 命令列工具來管理 SQL Server 資料庫與資料表的變更通知。

trans-unit.source: To call any of the methods in this class, the account you use to access the SQL Server database must have permissions to create tables and stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫此類別中的任何一種方法，您用來存取 SQL Server 資料庫的帳戶必須具有建立資料表和預存程序的權限。

trans-unit.source: To enable notifications on a specific table, you must have permissions to create a SQL Server trigger on that table.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用特定資料表上的通知，您必須在該資料表上建立 SQL Server 觸發程序的權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to set permissions on a database, see the SQL Server documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何在資料庫上設定權限的詳細資訊，請參閱 SQL Server 文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the account used by the ASP.NET process, see [ASP.NET Impersonation](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0cb3024-562f-4184-9d3c-095504787d3d).
trans-unit.target: 如需 ASP.NET 處理序所使用的帳戶的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 模擬](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0cb3024-562f-4184-9d3c-095504787d3d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is a simple ASP.NET page for enabling and disabling change notifications on SQL Server database tables.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例是簡單的 ASP.NET 頁面，啟用和停用 SQL Server 資料庫資料表上的變更通知。

trans-unit.source: It uses the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin> object to manage change notifications in the database specified in a connection string called `MyConnectionString`.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin>物件來管理呼叫的連接字串中指定的資料庫中的變更通知`MyConnectionString`。

trans-unit.source: The example includes two files, an .aspx file that defines the user interface and a code-behind file containing the source code for the ASP.NET events.
trans-unit.target: 此範例包含兩個檔案，定義使用者介面的.aspx 檔案和包含 ASP.NET 事件的程式碼的程式碼後置檔案。

trans-unit.source: The first sample is the .aspx file that defines the user interface.
trans-unit.target: 第一個範例會定義使用者介面的.aspx 檔案。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。

trans-unit.source: The second sample is the code-behind file containing the source code for the page events.
trans-unit.target: 第二個範例是包含網頁事件的程式碼的程式碼後置檔案。

trans-unit.source: A connection string used to connect to the SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: 用來連接 SQL Server 資料庫的連接字串。

trans-unit.source: Disables <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency" /> change notifications for the specified database.
trans-unit.target: 停用指定資料庫的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency" /> 變更告知。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.DisableNotifications%2A> method removes support for change notifications from the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.DisableNotifications%2A>方法會從指定的資料庫中移除變更通知支援`connectionString`參數。

trans-unit.source: Once you have run the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.DisableNotifications%2A> method, you must run the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableNotifications%2A> method if you wish to re-enable change notifications for a database.
trans-unit.target: 一旦執行<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.DisableNotifications%2A>方法，您必須執行<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableNotifications%2A>方法，如果您想要重新啟用變更告知的資料庫。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.DisableNotifications%2A> method to disable change notifications for the database specified by the connection string `MyConnectionString`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.DisableNotifications%2A>方法，以停用變更連接字串所指定之資料庫的通知`MyConnectionString`。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin>類別概觀主題。

trans-unit.source: A connection to the database could not be established.
trans-unit.target: 無法建立與資料庫的連接。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The security context of the ASP.NET application does not have permission to connect to the database.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 應用程式的安全性內容無權連接到資料庫。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The security context of the ASP.NET application does not have permission to disable notifications for the database.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 應用程式的安全性內容無權停用資料庫的告知。

trans-unit.source: Disables <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency" /> change notifications on a SQL Server database table or an array of database tables.
trans-unit.target: 在 SQL Server 資料庫資料表或資料庫資料表陣列上，停用 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency" /> 變更告知。

trans-unit.source: A connection string used to connect to the SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: 用來連接 SQL Server 資料庫的連接字串。

trans-unit.source: The database table on which to disable change notifications.
trans-unit.target: 要停用變更告知的資料庫資料表。

trans-unit.source: Disables <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency" /> change notifications on a SQL Server database table.
trans-unit.target: 在 SQL Server 資料庫資料表上停用 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency" /> 變更告知。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.DisableTableForNotifications%2A> method disables change notifications for the table specified in the `table` parameter, which must be in the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.DisableTableForNotifications%2A>方法停用異動中指定之資料表的通知`table`參數中指定的資料庫中必須是`connectionString`參數。

trans-unit.source: Once you have used the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.DisableTableForNotifications%2A> method to disable change notifications for a table, you must use one of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableTableForNotifications%2A> overloads if you wish to re-enable change notifications.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您已經使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.DisableTableForNotifications%2A>方法，以停用變更資料表的通知，您必須使用其中一個<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableTableForNotifications%2A>多載，如果您想要重新啟用變更通知。

trans-unit.source: The following code example disables change notification on a table specified in the connection string `MyConnectionString`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會停用變更連接字串中指定的資料表上的通知`MyConnectionString`。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin>類別概觀主題。

trans-unit.source: The database is not enabled for change notifications.
trans-unit.target: 資料庫未啟用變更告知。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="table" /> is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="table" /> 為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="table" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="table" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A connection to the database could not be established.
trans-unit.target: 無法建立與資料庫的連接。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The security context of the ASP.NET application does not have permission to connect to the database.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 應用程式的安全性內容無權連接到資料庫。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The security context of the ASP.NET application does not have permission to disable notifications for the database.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 應用程式的安全性內容無權停用資料庫的告知。

trans-unit.source: A connection string used to connect to the SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: 用來連接 SQL Server 資料庫的連接字串。

trans-unit.source: The array of SQL Server database tables on which to disable change notifications.
trans-unit.target: 要停用變更告知的 SQL Server 資料庫資料表陣列。

trans-unit.source: Disables <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency" /> change notifications on an array of SQL Server database tables.
trans-unit.target: 在 SQL Server 資料庫資料表的陣列上，停用 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency" /> 變更告知。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.DisableTableForNotifications%2A> method removes change notifications from the tables specified in the `tables` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.DisableTableForNotifications%2A>方法移除變更通知中指定的資料表從`tables`參數。

trans-unit.source: These tables must be in the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這些資料表都必須在指定的資料庫中`connectionString`參數。

trans-unit.source: Once you have used the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.DisableTableForNotifications%2A> method to disable change notifications for a list of tables, you must use one of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableTableForNotifications%2A> overloads if you wish to re-enable change notifications.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您已經使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.DisableTableForNotifications%2A>方法，以停用變更的資料表清單的通知，您必須使用其中一個<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableTableForNotifications%2A>多載，如果您想要重新啟用變更通知。

trans-unit.source: The database is not enabled for change notifications.
trans-unit.target: 資料庫未啟用變更告知。

trans-unit.source: One of the values in the <paramref name="tables" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="tables" /> 參數中的其中一個值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
One of the values in the <paramref name="tables" /> parameter is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="tables" /> 參數中的其中一個值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="tables" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="tables" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A connection to the database could not be established.
trans-unit.target: 無法建立與資料庫的連接。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The security context of the ASP.NET application does not have permission to connect to the database.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 應用程式的安全性內容無權連接到資料庫。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The security context of the ASP.NET application does not have permission to disable notifications for the database.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 應用程式的安全性內容無權停用資料庫的告知。

trans-unit.source: A connection string used to connect to the SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: 用來連接 SQL Server 資料庫的連接字串。

trans-unit.source: Enables <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency" /> change notifications on the specified database.
trans-unit.target: 啟用指定資料庫的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency" /> 變更告知。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableNotifications%2A> method adds support for change notifications from the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableNotifications%2A>方法會將支援變更通知中指定的資料庫從`connectionString`參數。

trans-unit.source: Once you have run the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableNotifications%2A> method, you must run the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.DisableNotifications%2A> method if you wish to disable change notifications for a database.
trans-unit.target: 一旦執行<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableNotifications%2A>方法，您必須執行<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.DisableNotifications%2A>方法，如果您想要停用變更資料庫的通知。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableNotifications%2A> method to enable change notifications for the database specified by the connection string `MyConnectionString`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableNotifications%2A>方法，才能變更連接字串所指定之資料庫的通知`MyConnectionString`。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin>類別概觀主題。

trans-unit.source: A connection to the database could not be established.
trans-unit.target: 無法建立與資料庫的連接。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The security context of the ASP.NET application does not have permission to connect to the database.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 應用程式的安全性內容無權連接到資料庫。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The security context of the ASP.NET application does not have permission to disable notifications for the database.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 應用程式的安全性內容無權停用資料庫的告知。

trans-unit.source: Connects to a SQL Server database and prepares a database table or tables for <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency" /> change notifications.
trans-unit.target: 連接到 SQL Server 資料庫，並準備要管理 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency" /> 變更告知的一或多個資料庫資料表。

trans-unit.source: A connection string used to connect to the SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: 用來連接 SQL Server 資料庫的連接字串。

trans-unit.source: The database table on which to enable change notifications.
trans-unit.target: 要啟用變更告知的資料庫資料表。

trans-unit.source: Connects to the specified SQL Server database and enables the specified database table for <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency" /> change notifications.
trans-unit.target: 連接到指定的 SQL Server 資料庫，並啟用指定資料庫資料表的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency" /> 變更告知。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableTableForNotifications%2A> method adds change notifications for the table specified in the `table` parameter, which must be in the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableTableForNotifications%2A>方法會將指定的資料表中的變更通知`table`參數中指定的資料庫中必須是`connectionString`參數。

trans-unit.source: Once you have used the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableTableForNotifications%2A> method to add change notifications to a table, you must use one of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.DisableTableForNotifications%2A> overloads if you wish to disable change notifications.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您已經使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableTableForNotifications%2A>方法，將資料表變更通知，您必須使用其中一個<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.DisableTableForNotifications%2A>多載，如果您想要停用變更通知。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableTableForNotifications%2A> method to enable change notifications on the specified table in the database specified in the connection string `MyConnectionString`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableTableForNotifications%2A>方法，以啟用變更通知的連接字串中指定的資料庫中之指定資料表`MyConnectionString`。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin>類別概觀主題。

trans-unit.source: The database is not enabled for change notifications.
trans-unit.target: 資料庫未啟用變更告知。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="table" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="table" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A connection to the database could not be established.
trans-unit.target: 無法建立與資料庫的連接。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The security context of the ASP.NET application does not have permission to connect to the database.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 應用程式的安全性內容無權連接到資料庫。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The security context of the ASP.NET application does not have permission to disable notifications for the database.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 應用程式的安全性內容無權停用資料庫的告知。

trans-unit.source: A connection string used to connect to the SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: 用來連接 SQL Server 資料庫的連接字串。

trans-unit.source: The array of SQL Server database tables on which to enable change notifications.
trans-unit.target: 要啟用變更告知的 SQL Server 資料庫資料表陣列。

trans-unit.source: Connects to the specified SQL Server database and enables the specified array of database tables for <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency" /> change notification.
trans-unit.target: 連接到指定的 SQL Server 資料庫，並啟用指定資料庫資料表陣列的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency" /> 變更告知。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableTableForNotifications%2A> method adds change notifications for the tables specified in the `tables` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableTableForNotifications%2A>方法會將變更通知中指定的資料表`tables`參數。

trans-unit.source: These tables must be in the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這些資料表都必須在指定的資料庫中`connectionString`參數。

trans-unit.source: Once you have used the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableTableForNotifications%2A> method to add change notifications to a group of tables, you must use one of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.DisableTableForNotifications%2A> overloads if you wish to disable change notifications.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您已經使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableTableForNotifications%2A>方法，將一組資料表變更通知，您必須使用其中一個<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.DisableTableForNotifications%2A>多載，如果您想要停用變更通知。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableTableForNotifications%2A> method to enable change notifications on the tables specified in a semicolon-delimited list in the database specified in the connection string `MyConnectionString`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableTableForNotifications%2A>方法，才能變更連接字串中指定的資料庫中以分號分隔清單中指定的資料表上的通知`MyConnectionString`。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin>類別概觀主題。

trans-unit.source: The database is not enabled for change notifications.
trans-unit.target: 資料庫未啟用變更告知。

trans-unit.source: One of the values in the <paramref name="tables" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="tables" /> 參數中的其中一個值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
One of the values in the <paramref name="tables" /> parameter is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="tables" /> 參數中的其中一個值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="tables" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="tables" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A connection to the database could not be established.
trans-unit.target: 無法建立與資料庫的連接。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The security context of the ASP.NET application does not have permission to connect to the database.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 應用程式的安全性內容無權連接到資料庫。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The security context of the ASP.NET application does not have permission to disable notifications for the database.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 應用程式的安全性內容無權停用資料庫的告知。

trans-unit.source: A connection string used to connect to the SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: 用來連接 SQL Server 資料庫的連接字串。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a string array containing the name of every table that is enabled for change notifications in a SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: 擷取字串陣列，其包含 SQL Server 資料庫中每個已啟用變更告知的資料表名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string array that contains the names of the SQL Server database tables.
trans-unit.target: 字串陣列，其包含 SQL Server 資料庫資料表名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.GetTablesEnabledForNotifications%2A> method returns a string array containing the names of all tables in the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter that are enabled for change notifications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.GetTablesEnabledForNotifications%2A>方法會傳回字串陣列，包含在指定的資料庫中的所有資料表的名稱`connectionString`已啟用變更通知的參數。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a string array of the tables enabled for change notifications in the database specified in the connection string `MyConnectionString`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立資料表啟用變更通知，在連接字串中指定的資料庫中的字串陣列`MyConnectionString`。

trans-unit.source: For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin>類別概觀主題。

trans-unit.source: The database is not enabled for change notifications
trans-unit.target: 資料庫未啟用變更告知。

trans-unit.source: A connection to the database could not be established.
trans-unit.target: 無法建立與資料庫的連接。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The security context of the ASP.NET application does not have permission to connect to the database.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 應用程式的安全性內容無權連接到資料庫。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The security context of the ASP.NET application does not have permission to disable notifications for the database.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 應用程式的安全性內容無權停用資料庫的告知。
